card.name: Athreos, God of Passage
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to white and black is less than seven, Athreos isn't a creature. Whenever another creature you own dies, return it to your hand unless target opponent pays 3 life.

card.name: Bane of Bala Ged
card.text: Whenever Bane of Bala Ged attacks, defending player exiles two permanents they control.

card.name: Behold the Beyond
card.text: Discard your hand. Search your library for three cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Bring to Light
card.text: Converge — Search your library for a creature, instant, or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Dark Petition
card.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, add {B}{B}{B}.

card.name: Enter the Infinite
card.text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

card.name: Gladecover Scout
card.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Gurmag Angler
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

card.name: Hidden Strings
card.text: You may tap or untap target permanent, then you may tap or untap another target permanent. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Hornet Nest
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Hornet Nest is dealt damage, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Jace, Vryn's Prodigy
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.

card.name: Jace, Telepath Unbound
card.text: +1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until your next turn. −3: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. −9: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, target opponent mills five cards."

card.name: Legion Loyalist
card.text: Haste Battalion — Whenever Legion Loyalist and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn and can't be blocked by creature tokens this turn.

card.name: Liliana, Heretical Healer
card.text: Lifelink Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer
card.text: +2: Each player discards a card. −X: Return target nonlegendary creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Mogis, God of Slaughter
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to black and red is less than seven, Mogis isn't a creature. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Mogis deals 2 damage to that player unless they sacrifice a creature of their choice.

card.name: Purphoros, God of the Forge
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red is less than five, Purphoros isn't a creature. Whenever another creature you control enters, Purphoros deals 2 damage to each opponent. {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Silence
card.text: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

card.name: Sylvan Caryatid
card.text: Defender, hexproof {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) {2}{G/U}{G/U}: Mill two cards, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Temporal Trespass
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Trespass.

card.name: The Chain Veil
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't activate a loyalty ability of a planeswalker this turn, you lose 2 life. {4}, {T}: For each planeswalker you control, you may activate one of its loyalty abilities once this turn as though none of its loyalty abilities have been activated this turn.

card.name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
card.text: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

card.name: Void Shatter
card.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Voyaging Satyr
card.text: {T}: Untap target land.
